entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Spiritwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Spiritwood 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: WNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
